alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Crawford; Macon; Marion; Schley; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 5:39PM EST until January 12 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Macon County in west central Georgia... Central Marion County in west central Georgia... East central Chattahoochee County in west central Georgia... Southwestern Crawford County in central Georgia... Northwestern Schley County in west central Georgia... Taylor County in west central Georgia... * Until 615 PM EST. * At 539 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Howard to near Tazewell to near Zellobee, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, Butler, Roberta, Reynolds, Ideal, Brantley, Christopher, Nakomis, Rupert, Charing, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Mauk, Tazewell, Horns and Fickling Mill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for central and west central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Chattahoochee; Crawford; Macon; Marion; Schley; Taylor
